pluginstrument.author: Nans Plancher
pluginstrument.description:
Lxnav S10x implementation for the discus 2c glider
Features implemented : - Vario speed in a +/-5 m/s range. Vario needle in medium size - Relative wind direction arrow, wind direction and speed within a textbox in m/s - Avg vario on a period of 20s - Altitude in meters
Github repository : https://github.com/nan0/air-manager-instrument_lxnax-s10x
